    public static class LighterUndertow.Builder

    Lighter.Builder implementation for the Undertow backend.

    • Method Detail

      • addRouter

        public LighterUndertow.Builder addRouter(RouteConfiguration configuration)
        Description copied from interface: Lighter.Builder
        Add all the routes from the given route configuration object. This method can be called multiple times on a builder. This method is currently one of the few methods where runtime exceptions can occur during Lighter configuration. If the added RouteConfiguration instance contains routes that already exist, this method may throw a IllegalArgumentException
        Specified by:
        addRouter in interface Lighter.Builder
        Parameters:
        configuration - The route configuration to add
        Returns:
        self

      • adapterFactory

        public LighterUndertow.Builder adapterFactory(TypeAdapterFactory factory)
        Description copied from interface: Lighter.Builder
        Add a type adaptor factory for serialization and deserialization of data to Java objects. The factory added must be sufficient for all types and media types the application requires. This method should only be called once.
        Specified by:
        adapterFactory in interface Lighter.Builder

      • addResponseTransformer

        public LighterUndertow.Builder addResponseTransformer(GlobalRequestTransformer transformer)
        Description copied from interface: Lighter.Builder
        Add a response transformer that will run for EVERY response generated by lighter. This method can be called multiple times to add multiple transformers. Transformers are not guaranteed to run in any order.
        Specified by:
        addResponseTransformer in interface Lighter.Builder
        Parameters:
        transformer - the transformer to be used on responses

        self
